price: 19. Ha ahaannina sida kuwa hilmaamay Alle, Isna markaas uu hilmaansiiyey nafahooda (inay camal san u fashaan): kuwan weeye kuwa ah caasiyaasha.
arabic: وَلَا تَكُونُواْ كَٱلَّذِينَ نَسُواْ ٱللَّهَ فَأَنسَىٰهُمۡ أَنفُسَهُمۡۚ أُوْلَٰٓئِكَ هُمُ ٱلۡفَٰسِقُونَ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walā takūnū ka-alladhīna nasū al-laha fa-ansāhum anfusahum ulāika humu al-fāsiqūna
